theme_tvyal <- function(base_size = 12, base_family = "sans")
{
  colors <- deframe(ggthemes::ggthemes_data[["fivethirtyeight"]])
  (ggthemes::theme_foundation(
    base_size = base_size, base_family = base_family) +
      theme(
        line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        rect = element_rect(fill = "white", linetype = 0, colour = NA),
        text = element_text(colour = colors["Dark Gray"]),
        # axis.title = element_blank(),
        # axis.text = element_text(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_blank(),
        legend.background = element_rect(),
        legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.direction = "horizontal",
        legend.box = "vertical",
        panel.grid = element_line(colour = NULL),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(
          colour = colors["Medium Gray"], 
          linetype = "dotted"
        ),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_line(
          colour = colors["Medium Gray"], 
          linetype = "dotted"
        ),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0, size = rel(1.5), face = "bold"),
        plot.margin = unit(c(1, 1, 1, 1), "lines"), strip.background = element_rect()
      )
  )
}

theme_set(theme_tvyal())

save_last_plot <-
  function(filename, extension = "png", width = 1008, height = 567) {

    filename <- str_replace_all(filename, ", ", "_")
    last_plot <- recordPlot()

    if (extension == "png") {
      png(paste0(filename, ".", extension), width = width, height = height)
    } else if (extension == "pdf") {
      pdf(paste0(filename, ".", extension), width = width, height = height)
    } else {
      stop("Unsupported file extension. Use 'png' or 'pdf'.")
    }

    replayPlot(last_plot)
    dev.off()
    paste0(filename, ".", extension)
  }

```{r plot generator function, include=FALSE}

taxes_quarter_plot <- function(registration, year_ = 2021, logo){
  
  taxes_data_with_quarter_label <- 
    taxes_data |> 
    filter(
      registration_number == registration,
      year >= year_
    ) |> 
    mutate(
      quarter_label = sprintf("%s (%s)", year(date), as.roman((month(date) - 1) %/% 3 + 1)),
      quarter_label = fct_rev(fct_inorder(quarter_label)),
      total_taxes_Q = total_taxes_Q / 1000
    )
  
  colors_count <- nrow(taxes_data_with_quarter_label)
  
  taxes_data_with_quarter_label |> 
    ggplot(aes(quarter_label, total_taxes_Q, fill = quarter_label)) +
    annotation_custom(
      rasterGrob(
        logo, interpolate = TRUE,
        width = unit(0.6, "npc") * (2024 - year_) / 3,
        height = unit(0.6, "npc") / 1.5
      ),
      xmin = 0, xmax = 6, ymin = 0, ymax = Inf
    ) +
    geom_col() +
    geom_text(aes(y = -500, label = n_Q)) +
    geom_text(
      aes(y = total_taxes_Q + 700,
          label = number(total_taxes_Q, accuracy = 1),
          color = quarter_label)
    ) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = colfunc2(colors_count)) +
    scale_color_manual(values = colfunc2(colors_count)) +
    # coord_fixed(ratio = 1/10000) +
    theme(
      legend.position = "none",
      axis.line.y = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
      axis.text.y = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.y = element_blank()
    ) +
    labs(
      x = NULL,
      y = NULL,
      caption = "The numbers below columns show the place of the taxpayer in the given quarter\n\nAuthor: Aghasi Tavadyan   |   tvyal.com   |   tavadyan.com   |   Data Source: src.am"
    )
  
}

```

ิป ีฟีกึีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ Wildberries-ีซ ึ Mobile Center-ีซ, Pretty Way (Vesta) ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีซึ ีฐีกึีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฅีฏีกีดีธึีฟีถีฅึีซ ีจีถีคีกีดีฅีถีจ 62,1 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีถ ีง ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ ีกีพีฅีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีกึีชีฅึีซ ีฐีกึีฏีซึ: ีีกีฟีฏีกีถีทีกีฏีกีถ ีง, ีธึ ีซ ีฟีกึีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีพีฅึีธีถีทีตีกีฌ ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ, Pretty Way-ีจ ีพีณีกึีธึีด ีง ีฆีฃีกีฌีซ ีดีกึีฝีกีพีณีกึีถีฅึึ 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีจีถีคีฐีกีถีธึึ ีฐีกึีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฅีฏีกีดีธึีฟีถีฅึีจ ีฏีกีฆีดีฅีฌ ีฅีถ 33,3 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีด, ีดีกึีฝีกีฟีธึึึีฅึีจ ีฏีกีฆีดีฅีฌ ีฅีถ 29,5 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีด ีฏีกีด 88,6 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝึ ีีกึีฝีกีฟีธึึึีฅึีจ ีฝีธีพีธึีกีขีกึ ีฐีกีทีพีกึีฏีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีดีกึีฝีกีตีซีถ ีกึีชีฅึีซ ีฐีซีดีกีถ ีพึีกี ีถีฅึีกีผีฅีฌีธีพ ีถีฅึีดีธึีฎีพีธีฒ ีกีบึีกีถึีถีฅึีซ ีกึีชีฅึีจ ีขีธีฌีธึ ีฏีซึีกีผีฅีฌีซ ีฐีกึีฏีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีดีซีกีฝีซีถ, ีถีฅึีกีผีตีกีฌ ีกีพีฅีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีกึีชีฅึีซ ีฐีกึีฏีจ: ีึีฝีฟีซ ีดีกึีฝีกีตีซีถ ีฅีฏีกีดีธึีฟีถีฅึีซ ีดีซ ีดีกีฝีจ ีถีฅึีกีผีธึีด ีง ีถีฅึีดีธึีฎีพีธีฒ ีกีบึีกีถึีถีฅึีซ ิฑิฑี-ีถึ

ิดึีก ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีง ีพีฏีกีตีธึีด ีถีกึ ีกีตีถ, ีธึ 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีถีกีญีกีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟีพีกีฎ ีขีตีธึีปีฅีซึ Pretty Way-ีซีถ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีพีฅีฌ ีง ีกีถีธึีฒีฒีกีฏีซ ีฐีกึีฏีฅึีซึ 17,7 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีด (53 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝ): ีีดีกีถ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีถีฅึีจ ีฏีกีฟีกึีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีด ีดีซ ีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีซึ ีดีตีธึีฝ ีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีกีบึีกีถึีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกึีธีญีดีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฏีกีบีพีกีฎ ีกีถีธึีฒีฒีกีฏีซ ีฐีกึีฏีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีซึึ

### ีีกีตีฌีคีขีฅึีซีฝ

Wildberries-ีจ 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ 4-ึีค ีฅีผีกีดีฝีตีกีฏีซ ีฏีฟึีพีกีฎึีธีพ ีคีกึีฑีฅีฌ ีง 4-ึีค ีญีธีทีธึ ีฐีกึีฏีกีฟีธึีถี ีพีณีกึีฅีฌีธีพ 13,9 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดีซ ีฐีกึีฏึ 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ 4-ึีค ีฅีผีกีดีฝีตีกีฏีธึีด ีซึีฅีถีซึ ีกีผีกีป ีฅีถ ีดีซีกีตีถ ยซิณึีกีถีค ีีธีขีกีฏีธยป (24,3 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีด), ยซิถีกีถีฃีฅีฆีธึึีซ ีบีฒีถีฑีกีดีธีฌีซีขีคีฅีถีกีตีซีถ ีฏีธีดีขีซีถีกีฟยป (18,5 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีด) ึ ยซีีธีขีกีตีฌ ีฝีฅีถีฉึ ีกึีฟยป (16,0 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีด) ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจึ

ีีทีฅีถึ, ีธึ ีจีถีคีฐีกีถีธึึ 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ Wildberries-ีจ 6-ึีค ีฟีฅีฒีธึีด ีงี ีพีณีกึีฅีฌีธีพ 26,5 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดีซ ีฐีกึีฏ, ีธึีซ ีฏีฅีฝีซึ ีกีพีฅีฌีซีถ ีพีณีกึีพีฅีฌ ีง ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีฅีผีกีดีฝีตีกีฏีธึีดึ

ิดีฅีผึีฝ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีผีกีป Wildberries ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีญีธีทีธึีกีฃีธึีตีถ ีฐีกึีฏีกีฟีธึีถีฅึีซ ึีกีถีฏีธึีด 400-ึีค ีฐีธึีซีฆีธีถีกีฏีกีถีซึ ีงีฌ ึีกีฎึ ีงึึ 2022 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีกีตีฝ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีพีณีกึีฅีฌ ีง 0,8 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดีซ ีฐีกึีฏี ีดีฅีฏ ีฟีกึีธึีด ีกีณีฅีฌีธีพ 35 ีกีถีฃีกีดึ

ีีทีฅีถึ, ีธึ ีกีตีฝ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ 2022 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีพีณีกึีพีกีฎ 762 ีดีซีฌีซีธีถ ีคึีกีด ีฐีกึีฏีซ ีดีซีกีตีถ 70,3 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีถ ีง ีฅีฒีฅีฌ ีกีพีฅีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีกึีชีฅึีซ ีฐีกึีฏีจ (ิฑิฑี), ีซีฝีฏ 21,6 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีจี ีฅีฏีกีดีฟีกีฐีกึีฏึ ีีกีฝีฟีกึีซ ีพีณีกึีพีกีฎ ีฅีฏีกีดีฟีกีฐีกึีฏีซ ีดีกีฝีถีกีขีกีชีซีถีถ ีกีพีฅีฌีกึีฅีฌ ีง 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีฅีฏีกีดีฟีกีฐีกึีฏีซ ีดีกีฝีถีกีขีกีชีซีถีจ ีฆีฃีกีฌีซ ีฏึีณีกีฟีพีฅีฌ ีง ึีกีถีฆีซ ีกีตีฝ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ ิฑิฑี ีพีณีกึีถีฅึีจ 1 ีฟีกึีพีก ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีกีณีฅีฌ ีฅีถ 48 ีกีถีฃีกีดึ 

ีีดีกีถ ีกึีกีฃ, ีงึีฝีบีธีถีฅีถึีซีกีฌ ีกีณีซ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีถีฅึีธึีด Wildberries-ีจ ีฐีกีปีธึีค ีฟีกึีซ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีคีกีผีถีกีฌ ีกีดีฅีถีกีญีธีทีธึ ีฐีกึีฏีกีฟีธึีถ: Wildberries-ีซ ีฐีกึีฏีฅึีซ 97,5 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีจ ิฑิฑี ีง, ีดีกึีฝีกีฟีธึึึีฅึ ีนีซ ีพีณีกึีฅีฌ, ึีกีถีซ ีธึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ิติฑีี ีกีถีคีกีด ีฅึีฏีซึ ีงึ

## 2. English Summary

**๐๐ Wildberries grew 35 times in 1 year**

* Wildberries' Remarkable Growth:

In the 4th quarter of 2023, Wildberries experienced an astonishing 35-fold increase in taxes, securing its position as the 4th largest taxpayer in Armenia. The company's tax contributions amounted to 13.9 billion drams, surpassing renowned entities like "Grand Tobacco" and "Zangezur Copper-Molybdenum Combine." Notably, Wildberries jumped from below the 400th position to the 6th largest taxpayer within just two years, paying a total of 26.5 billion drams in taxes for 2023. This rapid growth, mainly driven by Value Added Tax (VAT), positions Wildberries as a potential front-runner for becoming the leading taxpayer in the coming year.

* Insights into Other Major Taxpayers:

Mobile Center, the 3rd largest taxpayer in Q4 2023, closely followed Wildberries, contributing 46.1 billion drams in taxes, with a significant portion (95.5 percent) attributed to Value Added Tax. Meanwhile, Pretty Way (Vesta), securing the 5th position, demonstrated a distinctive tax structure with 62.1 percent of its revenue derived from VAT and notable customs fees. The company's tax revenues surged to 33.3 billion drams in 2023, showcasing a 3.9-fold increase compared to 2022. Additionally, Armenia's export dynamics highlighted a shift from alcoholic beverages to smartphones and consumer electronics, signifying changing trends in the country's economic landscape.
